__e: If you saw me before... I lost all my hair.
One day, he sent back two trucks full of stuff because it wasn't good enough for us.
And yet, you should have seen him when he first came here, not even twelve years ago.
It would wake me up in the middle of the night... just like you were there in the room with me.
You think about what those two could have done today if you hadn't have been out there.
The thing about expectations is most of the time, someone else sets them for you, yet you feel like they've been there all along and you can't wait to live up to them.

If you hadn't borrowed my car all freaking night, I wouldn't had to ride with her.
